statements: SELECT * FROM TeamTasks WHERE deadline >= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT task_name, skill_required, workload FROM TeamTasks WHERE status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY workload ASC;
SELECT task_name, assigned_to FROM TeamTasks WHERE skill_required = 'Programming' AND status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM TeamTasks WHERE assigned_to = 'John Doe' AND deadline < '2022-08-15';
SELECT task_name, status FROM TeamTasks WHERE status IN ('Pending', 'In Progress') ORDER BY deadline ASC;
SELECT * FROM TeamTasks WHERE skill_required = 'Programming' ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, assigned_to, status FROM TeamTasks WHERE status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY workload DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, assigned_to, deadline FROM TeamTasks WHERE assigned_to = 'John Doe' AND status = 'Pending';
SELECT task_id, task_name, deadline, workload FROM TeamTasks WHERE status = 'Completed' ORDER BY deadline ASC, workload DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, task_description FROM TeamTasks WHERE deadline BETWEEN '2022-09-01' AND '2022-10-01';
SELECT * FROM tasks
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM tasks
SELECT task_name, skills_required FROM tasks WHERE assigned_to = 1
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM tasks ORDER BY deadline DESC
SELECT * FROM team_members WHERE role = 'Developer'
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE task_id = 1
SELECT task_name, skills_required FROM tasks WHERE assigned_to = 5 ORDER BY deadline DESC
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM tasks WHERE skills_required LIKE '%programming%' ORDER BY deadline ASC
SELECT task_name, team_members.member_name AS assigned_member FROM tasks JOIN team_members ON tasks.assigned_to = team_members.member_id
SELECT task_name, skills_required, deadline FROM tasks WHERE assigned_to IN (SELECT member_id FROM team_members WHERE role='Developer')
SELECT * FROM tasks ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT task_name, skill_level FROM tasks WHERE skill_level > 3;
SELECT task_name, role_name FROM tasks JOIN team_members ON tasks.assignee_id = team_members.member_id JOIN roles ON team_members.role = roles.role_id;
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM tasks WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY deadline;
SELECT task_name, member_name FROM tasks JOIN team_members ON tasks.assignee_id = team_members.member_id WHERE team_members.availability > '12:00:00';
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE deadline > '2022-12-31';
SELECT task_name, skill_level FROM tasks WHERE assignee_id = 1 ORDER BY skill_level DESC;
SELECT t.task_name, m.member_name FROM tasks t JOIN team_members m ON t.assignee_id = m.member_id WHERE t.skill_level > 2;
SELECT r.role_name, COUNT(m.member_name) AS total_members FROM roles r JOIN team_members m ON r.role_name = m.role GROUP BY r.role_name ORDER BY total_members DESC;
SELECT task_name, role_name FROM tasks t JOIN team_members m ON t.assignee_id = m.member_id JOIN roles r ON m.role = r.role_name WHERE t.deadline < '2023-06-30';
SELECT * FROM tasks
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM tasks WHERE status='In Progress'
SELECT task_name, assigned_to, deadline FROM tasks WHERE deadline >= '2023-01-01'
SELECT member_name, skills FROM team_members
SELECT role_name, responsibilities FROM roles
SELECT task_name, task_description, deadline FROM tasks
SELECT task_name, assigned_to, deadline, status FROM tasks ORDER BY deadline DESC
SELECT task_name, assigned_to, status FROM tasks WHERE status='In Progress'
SELECT member_name, skills, availability FROM team_members JOIN assignments ON team_members.member_id = assignments.team_member_id
SELECT role_name, responsibilities FROM roles JOIN assignments ON roles.role_id = assignments.role_id
SELECT * FROM team_members
SELECT task_name, description, due_date FROM tasks
SELECT role_name, responsibilities, role_id FROM roles
SELECT member_name, skills FROM team_members
SELECT task_name, assignee_id FROM tasks
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT task_name, description, due_date FROM tasks WHERE assignee_id = 2;
SELECT member_name, skills, availability FROM team_members WHERE workload > 50;
SELECT role_name, responsibilities FROM roles WHERE role_id BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT assignment_id, task_id, role_id, assigned_member_id FROM team_assignments ORDER BY assignment_date DESC;
